info.description: RESTful API for the Denner Portal
info.title: Denner Portal 2.0

tags: Articles and Promotions – Artikel und Aktionen
get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all article groups (Warengruppen).

tags: Articles and Promotions – Artikel und Aktionen
get.description:
Use this operation to get a list of all articles.

To get only shop wines set 'filter' param to '[{"property":"in_shop","operator":"eq","type":"boolean","value":true}]'

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filters: JSON array of Filter object, urlencoded.

Filter object:
- property: Property to filter on.
- operator: Operation property. Enumeration ('eq', 'like', 'lt', 'gt', 'in', ...). Dependent from property (not all might be allowed).
- type: Type of value. Enumeration ('string', 'integer', 'boolean', 'array') Dependent from property and operator (not all might be allowed).
- value: Value. Must be of the defined type.

Examples:
- [{"property":"id","operator":"in","type":"array","value":["7627150d-36bd-4867-89b2-091800a03d24","58afec5c-ece9-4b66-bc55-00d6dc1b65b8"]}]
- [{"property":"in_shop","operator":"eq","type":"boolean","value":true}]

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all online filters (Angebotsfilter; e.g. "Aktionen aktuelle Woche" or "Aktionen der Folgewoche").

title.value: Hits de la semaine en cours

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all online groups (Internet-Sortimente).
Use this operation to get a list of all publications targeted at online channels, e.g. denner.ch or the Mobile App (Online-Werbemittel).

get.summary: Get single online publication (includes all advertised articles)
get.description: Use this operation to get a single publication targeted at online channels, e.g. denner.ch or the Mobile App (Online-Werbemittel). The response will include the articles assigned to this publication.

parameters.name: publication_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an online publication

region.value: Nur in der deutschen und französischen Schweiz erhältlich

store.value: Nur in Filialen mit Frischprodukten erhältlich
Disponible(s) uniquement dans les succursales aves des produits frais

title.value: Bevande da tavola e acque minerali

fits_with.value: Pasta, carni accompagnate da salse aromatiche

character.value: Dunkles Rubinrot. In der Nase Aromen von roten Beeren, reifen Kirschen und Brombeeren. Geschmeidig im Gaumen.
Robe rubis foncé. Nez de baies rouges, de cerises matures et de mûres. Bouche moelleuse.

tags: Articles and Promotions – Artikel und Aktionen
get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all promotion types (Aktionstypen).
Use this operation to get a list of all publications targeted at advertising screens (Screen-Werbemittel).

get.summary: Get single screen publication (includes all advertised articles)
get.description: Use this operation to get a single publication targeted at advertising screens (Screen-Werbemittel). The response will include the articles assigned to this publication.

parameters.name: publication_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an online publication

region.value: Nur in der deutschen und französischen Schweiz erhältlich

store.value: Nur in Filialen mit Frischprodukten erhältlich
Disponible(s) uniquement dans les succursales aves des produits frais

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all store channels (Filialkanäle; e.g. "Denner" or "Denner Satellit").
Use this operation to get a list of all store services (Filialangebote; e.g. "Humidor" or "Backstation").

title.value: Frutta e verdura in vendita sfusa

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all stores (Filialen).

Cooling.description: Cooling type (0 = no cooling, 1 = refrigerated, 2 = frozen)

Validity.description: Generic validity based on dates (from/to) and a corresponding text

ArticleValidity.description: Article validity based on dates (from/to) and corresponding texts (short and long version)

credit_card.description: Credit card can be used for payments?

closed.description: Is the store closed on this day?

value.description: Navision stock count, might be negative

featured.description: Is it a featured article (should be displayed on the front/main/home page)?

promoted.description: Is it a promoted article (should be displayed with full information)?

compared.description: Is the article's price compared to an offer from an other company?
Is the article's price compared to an offer from an other company?

filters.description: Online filter with appearances (and no localised title)

allow_featuring.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be featured (i.e. displayed on front/main/home page)?

allow_promotion.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be promoted (i.e. displayed on a promotional page)?

allow_background.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be displayed with a background (i.e. displayed on a page with a deceptive/trivializing background)?
